Greetings to all,
I have just added a translation of the NBTHK's shinsa standards to my web
site.  Also,  I have added a Mino Kanesada tanto and a Koto wakizashi with
an o kissaki and a koshirae to the sales section.  Please take a look at the
link below if you have any interest. Thank you.

 http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
